title: Google | SWE-III (L4) | Bangalore | Jan 2025 [Accepted]
content:
Education: BTech in Computer Science
Years of Experience: 3.5
Prior Experience: Backend Developer at mid-sized indian startup

**Current Compensation:**
Base Salary: ₹20 LPA
Bonus: ₹1 LPA
Total CTC: ₹21 LPA

Date of the Offer: January 2025
Company: Google
Title/Level: SWE-III, L4
Location: Bangalore, India

**Offer Compensation**
Salary: ₹37 LPA
Target Bonus: ₹5.7 LPA
Stock Bonus: $108K USD
Signing Bonus: ₹2L
Other Benefits: ₹3L (Google std. benefits)

Total CTC: ₹1.38 Cr INR (post-negotiation)
1st Year Total (Base + Target Bonus + Signing Bonus + Stocks + Benefits): ₹82.4L
Relocation: Provided separately (details unknown)

Negotiation Details:
I didn’t have any better offer. I could only negotiate for increased stocks (to $108K USD) by compensating for signing bonus, which raised the total CTC to ₹1.38 Cr INR.


Hope this helps you guys in your compensation discussions! 🚀

Interview Experience : https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/6372760/Google-or-SWE-III-(L4)-or-Bangalore-or-Dec-2024-Offer

title: Booking Holdings Compensation Advice
content:
Years of Experience: 5+
Prior Experience: FAANG
Company: Booking Holdings
Title/Level: SDE2
Location: Bangalore, India
Salary: 50,00,000
Relocation/Signing Bonus: NA
Stock bonus: 20k vested over three years starting from 2nd year 
No stocks for first year
Bonus: 15%
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 57.5 lpa first year
Benefits: Standard
Other details:

Wanted to ask how much can max they go?
Can I negotiate on stocks, Joining bonus etc?
